sentences.sContent: ...specifically the Center for Tobacco Products and are reanalyzing the whole row of the idea of the warning labels and the idea of how graphic they should be...
...the most graphic example being climate change...
...Other countries have much more graphic detail of the potential dangers of smoking...
...the fashion designer Marc Ecko and the graphic designer Stefan Sagmeister in addressing a group of advertising people on "Marketing to the Child of Tomorrow"...

synos.tran: 形象的；图表的；绘画似的

phrases.pCn: 平面造型设计；图示设计
平面艺术（含版画与刻印等）；形象艺术
图形显示；图形显示器，图形显示系统
图示均衡器；图表均衡器

remMethod.val: graph(书写) ＋ ic(…的) → 文字的

words.tran: 生动地；活灵活现地；用图表表示；轮廓分明地
[测] 制图学；制图法；图表算法
笔迹学；笔迹相法；图表法

trans.tranCn: 生动的， 形象的； 绘画的， 文字的， 图表的
trans.tranOther: Graphic means concerned with drawing or pictures, especially in publishing, industry, or computing
